panels.description: Service Availability over past 2 weeks (up and running because targets could be scraped)
panels.title: SA %

panels.description: Data Availability : Current % of targets which are available for all Prometheus jobs, ideally it should be 100% meaning that all nodes, all containers are properly scraped, ie Prometheus DA =100%
panels.title: DA %

panels.description: The number of open head chunks.
panels.title: Scraped

panels.description: Sample ingestion rate good to know for dimensioning the CPU and memory of Prometheus
panels.title: Ingested/Hour

panels.description: % CPU max usage (max usage/Limit), should not exceed 70%, otherwise Prometheus may be unresponsive
panels.title: CPU Usage %

panels.description: % Mem max usage (max RSS/Limit), should not exceed 70%, otherwise Prometheus may crash
panels.title: Mem Usage %

panels.description: Scrape Duration will show how long the scrapes are taking, with percentiles available as series.
panels.title: Scrape Duration Interval

panels.description: % of targets which are available for all Prometheus jobs, ideally it should be 100% meaning that all nodes, all containers are properly scraped, ie Prometheus DA =100% You can look at the table on the right side to check what targets were not scraped.
panels.title: Data Availability

panels.description: Any targets that is not scraped
panels.title: Down Targets
